PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_EmbeddedTrack
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for track slab that have embedded tracks recessed into road surface.

PropertyDef.Name: IsAccessibleByVehicle
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the element is accessible by a vehicle or not.

PropertyDef.Name: HasDrainage
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the infrastructure element has drainage embedded or not.

PropertyDef.Name: PermissibleRoadLoad
PropertyDef.Definition: Permissible traffic load for the road design.
